![Busy bees – Swiss Geoinformation Strategy (SGS) 2020](sgs.png "Busy bees – Swiss Geoinformation Strategy (SGS) 2020")

On May 2, Swisstopo hosted a [colloquium](https://www.swisstopo.admin.ch/de/strategie-geoinformation-schweiz) to present the current state of [Swiss Geoinformation Strategy (SGS)](https://www.geo.admin.ch/de/strategie-und-umsetzung) implementation and ongoing SGS projects. 

Now, the [recording is online](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6Kkgn_JJLvo). The colloquium is in German and in French, slides are usually bilingual. The video has auto-generated captions and auto-translations of those:

{{< video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6Kkgn_JJLvo >}}

Contributors and contributions:

- Christine Najar: State of SGS implementation
- Peter Staub: What drives us?
- Pasquale di Donato: LLMs for geospatial
- Christine Najar: Digital Twin
- Evi Rothenbühler: Climate monitoring
- Beat Tschanz: Geoplatform Switzerland
- Christine Najar and Peter Staub: Q&A
